review.title: “Great business, but with a couple of cons.”
review.pros: Pros – Most employees are happy to serve the customers.Owners are very nice and are very generous to employees and customers in need.Laid-back atmosphere most of the time.Management does not pick favorites. Very fair.
review.cons: Cons – Some employees are only there for their paychecks and do not always follow the rules.Gets very hot in the kitchen.Management does not always watch its words when speaking to employees.Located in a small town, so career opportunities can seem sparse if you are trapped in Northern Michigan.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep being awesome to your employees and to the public, you guys rock.
